1338.name: NiCrMo 59 Tig (alloy 59)
1338.Applications: Applications of alloy 59 in aggressively corrosive media include scrubbers for flue gas desulphurisation (FGD), digesters and papermaking equipment, chemical process plants, corrosion resistant overlays and in severe offshore and petrochemical environments.
1338.Suitable_For: duplex, super-duplex and super-austenitic stainless steels, nickel alloys such as UNS N06059 and N06022, INCONEL alloy C4, C-276, and INCONEL alloys 622, C22, 625, and 686 CPT, Alloy 31, Alloy 59, 1.4562, 2.4605, 2.4602, 2.4610, 2.4819,  NiCr21Mo14W, NiCr23Mo16Al, NiMo16Cr15Ti, NiMo16Cr15W
